title: snowflake.snowpark.udtf.UserDefinedTableFunction | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
Encapsulates a user defined table function that is returned by
udtf(), UDTFRegistration.register() or
UDTFRegistration.register_from_file(). The constructor of this class is not supposed
to be called directly.

Call an instance of UserDefinedTableFunction to generate a
TableFunctionCall instance. The input type can be
a column name as a str, or a Column object.
The Python class or a tuple containing the Python file path and the function name.
